name: Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Snipe
display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

name: Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Frag_Grenade
display_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

name: Advanced_Assault_Rifle_M30_Grenade
display_help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Web_Grenade
display_help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has snared you in his Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.

name: Advanced_Assault_Rifle_EMP_Grenade
display_help: This grenade can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage.
display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery

name: Grenade_Launcher_Sleep_Grenade
display_help: The Sleep Gas has rendered you unconscious. Any damage will awaken you from this state.

name: Hollow_Round
display_help: Large caliber hollow tip rounds deal lethal and smashing damage and can knock down foes.

name: Incindiary_Round
display_help: The Gunslingers Incendiary round has ignited you!

name: Liquid_Nitrogen_Round
display_help: The Gunslingers Liquid Nitrogen round has frozen you solid!

name: Explosive_Tip
display_help: Explosive Tip rounds can affect foes in a small area. The force of the explosion can knock down foes.

name: Narcotic_Dart
display_help: This Dart was filled with a deadly Narcotic. You are poisoned and unable to Regenerate your wounds. You probably will pass out.

name: Rapid_Fire
display_help: The Gunslinger can fire off a quick burst of lead in a wide cone.

name: Dart_Gun
display_help: The dart has slowed your attack rate and movement speed.

name: Multishot_Dart_Gun
display_help: The dart has slowed your attack rate and movement speed.

name: Heavy_Revolver
display_help: Large caliber sidearm. Slower than a standard pistol, but can knock down foes.

name: Pulse_Rifle_Blast
display_help: This Pulse Rifle can fire a long range blast of energy. Deals moderate Energy damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Pulse_Rifle_Burst
display_help: This high powered burst from your Pulse Rifle takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard blast and has a very good chance to send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Photon_Grenade
display_help: Launches an Energy Grenade at long range from your Pulse Rifle. The energy from this explosion can Disorient some targets in the affected area. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Nemesis_Storm_Gas
display_help: The Nemesis Storm Rifle can fire an exploding gas grenade at great range. Any foes trapped within the gas will slowly take damage from the poison.

name: Nemesis_Storm_Rifle
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Nemesis_Gatling_Gun
display_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Gatling Gun.

name: Nemesis_Flamethrower
display_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire. You are taking Fire damage over time.

name: Lance_Rifle
display_help: An extremely long range and very accurate weapon. Fires an explosive round that can knock down its target. The explosive round has a small area of effect.

name: Nemesis_Rifle
display_help: The Nemesis Rifle is a basic long range fire arm. Fires a burst of 3 shots at a targeted foe at good range and is very accurate.

name: Nictus_Rifle

name: Shotgun_Buckshot

name: Shotgun_Heavy_Slug
display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Sniper_Rifle
display_help: Sniper Rifle is a powerful piece of hardware. It is very accurate and has very long range. The impressive round can knock down its target.
